attributes.action: Raise awareness of early on set dementia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there is a servere lack of understanding of young people with dementia, there needs to be further advice on drug related dementia,hiv related dementia,korsakoff's dementia (drink related) There is a lack of funding available to this group, and almost no support, as no one expects younger people to have dementia. Please sign this petition as this can and does happen to anyone under 65, This is not an illness that affects the elderly only.
